name: Apocalypse Virus
description:
This is our entry for the Game Design Society Jam's 2018 edition. We created the game from scratch up in around 30h. It's a limited game, but it's what we managed to come up with. In the end, it turned out to be quite challenging. The theme is "Kill Absolutely Everything".

Credits:

Game Design, Programming: Juliano Reis

Art: Vitória Steckel

Music: Gustavo Nunes
